readable.title: 191003283_992257f835
readable.content: A little blond boy and a young woman in jeans walk through a plaza . A toddler boy in a red tank top and khaki shorts walks on the European street with a woman in a white top and faded blue jeans . A woman walks and a little boy walks to the side of her . A young boy wearing a red shirt stands in the street with his arms open wide . The baby is wearing a red shirt and walking in a plaza .
